scripts.hash: find src/ -type f -print0 | sort -z | xargs -0 openssl dgst -sha256 | openssl dgst -sha256 > .hash
scripts.changed: touch .hash; mv .hash old.hash; npm run hash; cmp old.hash .hash >/dev/null 2>&1
scripts.build: npm run changed && echo 'Skipping build' || npm run force-build; rm old.hash
